Text.val: 19.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen, removed BankID
14.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
26.11.2012 JH SCR17709 Removed casts from direct SQL
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
17.08.2005 AK Authorization control changed to the same as OPH410C
Only allow subtask to be accessed as long as no other action initiated

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OPH410D]: Daily received payments by bank')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BADT_BANKID, BADT_BANKACCOUNT, BADT_IBAN, BNKA_NAME, BADT.BADT_NPAYMENTS, BADT.BADT_DEBITSACCCURR, BADT.BADT_CREDITSACCCURR, BADT.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTS, BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT, BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER FROM :1/BADT AS BADT, :1/BNKA AS BNKA WHERE BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE = ':2' and BADT_BANK_ADMNO = :3 and BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO = :4 and BNKA_BANK_ADMNO = BADT_BANK_ADMNO and BNKA_BANK_LEDG_NO = BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO and BNKA_BANKID = BADT_BANKID and BNKA_BANKACCOUNT = BADT_BANKACCOUNT ORDER BY BADT_BANKACCOUNT for fetch only
